General.Name: JCH Systems Inc
General.Description: JCH Systems, Inc. distributes computer and related products, car infotainment products, and security and network equipment in South Korea and internationally. The company also engages in the software wholesale, telecommunications, and e-commerce businesses. In addition, it manufactures and sells electronics and communications devices. The company was formerly known as JC Hyun Systems, Inc. and changed its name to JCH Systems, Inc. in April 2017. JCH Systems, Inc. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 74 J.C. Hyun Building, Seoul, South Korea
